doc.after: Earth surface waters are filled with life The earliest life forms appeared in water nearly all fish live exclusively in water and there are many types of marine mammals such as dolphins and whales Some kinds of animals such as amphibians spend portions of their lives in water and portions on land Plants such as kelp and algae grow in the water and are the basis for some underwater ecosystems Plankton is generally the foundation of the ocean food chain
